,#{growPrdtIdx} /* grow_prdt_idx 성장_예측_지수 numeric */
,#{growPrdtCd} /* grow_prdt_cd 성장_예측_코드 character varying(20) */
,#{growPrdtDesc} /* grow_prdt_desc 성장_예측_설명 character varying(4000) */
,#{fatStndVer} /* fat_stnd_ver 비만_기준_버전 character varying(20) */
,#{fatStndNo} /* fat_stnd_no 비만_기준_번호 numeric */
,#{nutrEatQty} /* nutr_eat_qty 영양소_섭취_량 numeric */ ,#{fidx} /* fidx 비만지수 numeric */
,#{fatJudgCd} /* fat_judg_cd 비만_판정_코드 character varying(20) */
,#{fatJudgDesc} /* fat_judg_desc 비만_판정_설명 character varying(4000) */
,#{fatpBmiVal} /* fatp_bmi_val 비만예측_BMI_값 numeric */ ,#{fatpIdx} /* fatp_idx 비만예측_지수 numeric */
,#{fatpJudgCd} /* fatp_judg_cd 비만예측_판정_코드 character varying(20) */
,#{fatpJudgDesc} /* fatp_judg_desc 비만예측_판정_설명 character varying(4000) */
,#{palVal} /* pal_val 신체활동수준_값 numeric */
,#{palCd} /* pal_cd 신체활동수준_코드 character varying(20) */
,#{calNutrStatCd} /* cal_nutr_stat_cd 칼로리_영양섭취_상태_코드 character varying(20) */
,#{rmrk} /* rmrk 비고 character varying(4000) */
,to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */
,#{regUserId} /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
,to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */
,#{uptUserId} /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
) ON CONFLICT DO UPDATE
,sex_cd = #{sexCd} /* sex_cd 성별_코드 character varying(20) */
,age_ycnt = #{ageYcnt} /* age_ycnt 나이_년수 numeric */
,age_mcnt = #{ageMcnt} /* age_mcnt 나이_개월수 numeric */
,hght_val = #{hghtVal} /* hght_val 키_값 numeric */
,wght_val = #{wghtVal} /* wght_val 몸무게_값 numeric */
,bmi_val = #{bmiVal} /* bmi_val BMI_값 numeric */
,wast_size = #{wastSize} /* wast_size 허리_사이즈 numeric */
,cal_eat_qty = #{calEatQty} /* cal_eat_qty 칼로리_섭취_량 numeric */
,cal_csum_qty = #{calCsumQty} /* cal_csum_qty 칼로리_소모_량 numeric */
,mom_hght_val = #{momHghtVal} /* mom_hght_val 엄마_키_값 numeric */
,mom_wght_val = #{momWghtVal} /* mom_wght_val 엄마_몸무게_값 numeric */
,mom_bmi_val = #{momBmiVal} /* mom_bmi_val 엄마_BMI_값 numeric */
,dad_hght_val = #{dadHghtVal} /* dad_hght_val 아빠_키_값 numeric */
,dad_wght_val = #{dadWghtVal} /* dad_wght_val 아빠_몸무게_값 numeric */
,dad_bmi_val = #{dadBmiVal} /* dad_bmi_val 아빠_BMI_값 numeric */
,grow_stnd_ver = #{growStndVer} /* grow_stnd_ver 성장_기준_버전 character varying(20) */
,grow_stnd_no = #{growStndNo} /* grow_stnd_no 성장_기준_번호 numeric */
,gidx = #{gidx} /* gidx 성장지수 numeric */
,grow_judg_cd = #{growJudgCd} /* grow_judg_cd 성장_판정_코드 character varying(20) */
,grow_judg_desc = #{growJudgDesc} /* grow_judg_desc 성장_판정_설명 character varying(4000) */
,grow_prdt_idx = #{growPrdtIdx} /* grow_prdt_idx 성장_예측_지수 numeric */
,grow_prdt_cd = #{growPrdtCd} /* grow_prdt_cd 성장_예측_코드 character varying(20) */
,grow_prdt_desc = #{growPrdtDesc} /* grow_prdt_desc 성장_예측_설명 character varying(4000) */
,fat_stnd_ver = #{fatStndVer} /* fat_stnd_ver 비만_기준_버전 character varying(20) */
,fat_stnd_no = #{fatStndNo} /* fat_stnd_no 비만_기준_번호 numeric */
,nutr_eat_qty = #{nutrEatQty} /* nutr_eat_qty 영양소_섭취_량 numeric */
,fidx = #{fidx} /* fidx 비만지수 numeric */
,fat_judg_cd = #{fatJudgCd} /* fat_judg_cd 비만_판정_코드 character varying(20) */
,fat_judg_desc = #{fatJudgDesc} /* fat_judg_desc 비만_판정_설명 character varying(4000) */
,fatp_bmi_val = #{fatpBmiVal} /* fatp_bmi_val 비만예측_BMI_값 numeric */
,fatp_idx = #{fatpIdx} /* fatp_idx 비만예측_지수 numeric */
,fatp_judg_cd = #{fatpJudgCd} /* fatp_judg_cd 비만예측_판정_코드 character varying(20) */
,fatp_judg_desc = #{fatpJudgDesc} /* fatp_judg_desc 비만예측_판정_설명 character varying(4000) */
,pal_val = #{palVal} /* pal_val 신체활동수준_값 numeric */
,pal_cd = #{palCd} /* pal_cd 신체활동수준_코드 character varying(20) */
,cal_nutr_stat_cd = #{calNutrStatCd} /* cal_nutr_stat_cd 칼로리_영양섭취_상태_코드 character varying(20) */
,rmrk = #{rmrk} /* rmrk 비고 character varying(4000) */
,upt_dt = to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm = to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */
,upt_user_id = #{uptUserId} /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
mapper.delete: /* Generated SQL SQL ID : ts_gfix_hist.delete */ DELETE FROM ts_gfix_hist WHERE 1 = 1 AND stdt_no = #{stdtNo} /* stdt_no 학생_번호 numeric */ AND gfix_dt = #{gfixDt} /* gfix_dt 성장비만지수_일자 character(8) */
